ygData.subject: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok does anyone know what language is required to read Ipsor s Enlightenment IV (or maybe its V I forget but its the only other one sold in Freeport) I am now
ygData.messageBody:
Ok does anyone know what language is required to read Ipsor's Enlightenment
IV (or maybe its V I forget but its the only other one sold in Freeport)

I am now Excelent in 23 languages. Among them are
Old Erudin, Elder Elvish, Kobold (Elder Teir'Dal), Giant Toung (Combine
Toung), and Dragon.
Basically I am excelent in every language I have found so far. All 23 but
I still cant read that book. Do I need to work each language up to
"Master" or is there another Language out there that no one knows about yet?

Long Live the Brotherhood,
Lomack, BCK-MoR
